item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 1, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. A $1k Wheelchair (343 points | 131 comments)
2. COBOL has been “dead” for so long, my grandpa wrote about it (107 points | 106 comments)
3. Is the world really running out of sand? (337 points | 108 comments)
4. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (October 2024) (186 points | 170 comments)
5. Don't build your castle in other people's kingdoms (2021) (52 points | 19 comments)
6. A Local-First Case Study (74 points | 35 comments)
7. Show HN: A real time AI video agent with under 1 second of latency (217 points | 116 comments)
8. Verdn (YC W22) is hiring software engineers to build next-gen donation APIs ( | hide)
9. Juno for YouTube has been removed from the App Store (94 points | 45 comments)
10. Ask HN: Who is pretending to be hiring? (37 points | 1 comment)
11. Show HN: Sourcebot, an open-source Sourcegraph alternative (114 points | 18 comments)
12. ESO telescope captures the most detailed infrared map of the Milky Way (226 points | 50 comments)
13. Launch HN: Quetzal (YC S24) – Stripe for Internationalization (32 points | 23 comments)
14. Ask HN: Who wants to be hired? (October 2024) (95 points | 209 comments)
15. Bots, so many bots (220 points | 255 comments)
16. End the line: The last Sun SPARC workstation [video] (54 points | 30 comments)
17. What happens if someone votes by absentee/mail-in and dies before Election Day? (5 points | 3 comments)
18. Show HN: Web Scraping with Your Web Browser: Why Not? (38 points | 24 comments)
19. The $621M Legal Battle by Record Labels Against Internet Archive (100 points | 32 comments)
20. OpenAI DevDay 2024 live blog (158 points | 63 comments)
21. Comedy Theory (2022) (227 points | 165 comments)
22. Gorhill pulls uBlock Origin Lite from Firefox store (253 points | 266 comments)
23. Quake runs in just 276 kB RAM on the Arduino Nano Matter board (107 points | 17 comments)
24. Correlation Between the Use of Swearwords and Code Quality in Open Source Code [pdf] (7 points | 3 comments)
25. Mullenweg threatens corporate takeover of WP Engine (61 points | 42 comments)
26. Ryujinx (Nintendo Switch emulator) has been removed from GitHub (352 points | 245 comments)
27. The Netherlands has returned some stolen artifacts to Indonesia (152 points | 136 comments)
28. Comparing our Rust-based indexing and querying pipeline to Langchain (90 points | 46 comments)
29. Pro bettors disguising themselves as gambling addicts (166 points | 190 comments)
30. Anthropic hires OpenAI co-founder Durk Kingma (135 points | 66 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 1, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
